ygData.subject: Re: mip = many innapropriate pictures?
ygData.msgSnippet: I am only halfway thru my digests so i apologize if someone already responded to this problem...
ygData.messageBody:
I am only halfway thru my digests so i apologize if someone already responded
to this problem...

<<Problem with objects having wrong skins with voodoo3 card and mip mapping
turned on>>

After you get the Voodoo 3 installed with the latest drivers (2-9-00) you MUST
install DirectX 7.0a.

if you do not install DX 7.0a, you will have the skins being mis mapped
problem. or at least, installing DX 7.0a (available at microsoft website) fixed
the problem for me.

Kaleid,23rd song half elf bard
Glyphed Aegiss, 27th level DE magician, Junior Mistmoore Flunky(tm)
<Wave of the Dark Tide>
Prexus
